trans-unit.source: Manages serialization of activities into designer-generated source code segments before compilation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> to associate with this instance.
Adds the specified serialization provider to the serialization manager.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationProvider"></xref> to be added.

Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack"></xref> associated with <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager"></xref>.

Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.Context%2A> to provide information to a nested <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager>.

The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager"></xref>.
Creates an instance of the specified type and adds it to a collection of named instances.
This provides an indirect reference to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A> method of the same name.
The data <xref href="System.Type"></xref> to create.
An <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref> of arguments to pass to the constructor for the specified type.
The name assigned to the resulting object.
This name can be used to access the object later through <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.GetInstance(System.String)"></xref>.
If null is passed, the object is created but cannot be accessed by name.
`true` to add the object to the design container; otherwise, `false`.
The object must implement <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> for this to have any effect.
The newly created object instance.
Gets an <xref href="System.Object"></xref> of the specified name, or null if that <xref href="System.Object"></xref> does not exist.
This provides an indirect reference to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A> method of the same name.
The name of the <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to obtain.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> of the specified name, or null if that <xref href="System.Object"></xref> does not exist.
Gets the name of the specified <xref href="System.Object"></xref>, or null if the <xref href="System.Object"></xref> has no name.
If the object is not an activity the corresponding method of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager> is called.
If the activity has no parent, then the activity qualified ID is returned with any periods (.) replaced by underscores (_).
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to obtain the name for.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains the name of the <xref href="System.Object"></xref>.
Gets a serializer of the requested type for the specified <xref href="System.Object"></xref> type.
If the object type is a string, a default serializer is returned.
Otherwise the corresponding method of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A> is invoked.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Object"></xref> for which to obtain the serializer.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of serializer to retrieve.
A serializer of the requested type for the specified <xref href="System.Object"></xref> type.
Gets an <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that provides a service of the specified <xref href="System.Type"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of service to be provided.
A <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that provides a service of the specified <xref href="System.Type"></xref>.
Gets a <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the specified name.

This version of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.GetType%2A> provides an indirect reference to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A> property of the same name.
The fully qualified name of the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> to load.
An instance of the <xref href="System.Type"></xref>, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> cannot be loaded.
Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that contains a read-only collection of type <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.

Using the properties available in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> class, you can query <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.Properties%2A> about its contents.
Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Count%2A> property to determine the number of elements in the collection.
Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A> property to obtain a specific property by index number or by name.

In addition to properties, you can use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Find%2A> method to obtain a description of the property that uses the specified name from the collection.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that contains a read-only collection of type <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
Removes a custom serialization provider from the serialization manager.
`provider` must have been added using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.AddSerializationProvider%2A>.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.RemoveSerializationProvider%2A> provides an indirect reference to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A> property of the same name.
The provider to remove.
Reports an error in serialization.
`errorInformation` can be of any object type.
If the object is an exception, the message of the exception is extracted and reported to the user.
If the object is any other type, <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
is called to display the information to the user.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.ReportError%2A> provides an indirect reference to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A> method of the same name.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that contains the error to report.

Occurs when <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.GetName(System.Object)"></xref> cannot locate the specified name in the serialization manager name table.
For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
Occurs when serialization is complete.
For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager"></xref>.
Gets a stack-based, user-defined storage area that is useful for communication between nested serialization objects.

The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager"></xref>.
Sets the name of the specified existing <xref href="System.Object"></xref>.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SetName%2A> provides an indirect reference to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A> method of the same name.
An exception is thrown if you try to rename an existing object or if you try to give a new object a name that is already taken.
In addition, an exception is thrown if you do not pass in an existing object to the method.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> instance to name.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains the name to give the instance.
